comprehensive_overview: Pango is a library for layout and rendering of text, with an emphasis on internationalization. It forms the core of text and font handling for the GTK+ toolkit and is used by a variety of other open-source projects, including GNOME desktop environment.
core_features: 1. Support for multiple languages and writing systems. 2. Font fallback mechanism for displaying missing characters. 3. Bi-directional text support. 4. Advanced text layout capabilities, such as complex script rendering.
